title: Delightful 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath in Ravenswood, Available: Now
posting_body: Unreal two bedroom one bathroom in the heart of Ravenswood features updated kitchen with dishwasher, separate dining room, spacious living area, large bedrooms, great closet space, hardwood floors throughout, updated bathroom, laundry in unit, and pets are welcome!
Steps to shopping, nightlife, transportation, and more!
Please Call Molly Parshall at 262/402-8414‬ to schedule an appointment to view this apartment and mention Apartment ID: 22754.
